name: Dreambots
description:
Help our two semi-sentient Robo friends as they try to escape being reverse-engineered in this puzzle platformer made in a week for the Godot Wild Jam #55

Waking up in a capture simulation, two semi-sentient espionage robots must combine their skills to plot an escape or risk triggering a code that blows them up to bits.

Use the Arrow keys to move, Z to use special ability, X to interact, C to switch

Art by Queque

Sounds/Music by AnpingC & RYU

Level Designs by Raghu

Programming by POWERHACK
